name: EntertainmentBreifing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Listen to weekly entertainment from your favorite source. You can just say "Alexa, what's my flash briefing". You can say "Alexa, stop" to exit anytime.

This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.

All skills published to the Alexa Skill Blueprint are still remained in the creator's publishment, but to all standards, the rightful owner (Alexa Skills) has full responsibility to take down Breifings if they are not appropriate to kids under 12. Warning: both, creator, and the Skills Store owners are not responsible for misuse of overdose/overdosage on any person who listens. Be careful!!!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
